TopicTitle: 0.15-0.24 Mk3-Mk1 Plane and Aerodynamic parts, But with a slight twist!

Articles.Content:
Most of you may know, that before the Beta and/or 0.25 Mk1/Mk3 Plane parts(Mk1 to a lesser extent), Aerodynamic parts(More noticeably, the control surfaces) looked and/or behaved differently.

Sure i could go search the Add-on releases for Mk1 parts, and wait 5 minutes longer for Mk3 parts, but i, having a bit of fascination with broken down things that still miraculously work, would like to see those parts in such appearance! Scrapped, Decommisioned, Broken-Down, or however you may call it. Torn-off panels, broken windows, rust in some spots, dents, broken levers and buttons along with wires sticking out in the IVA view, maybe even the third seat in the Mk3 cockpit could be completly broken!

Those would be the details i could imagine seeing on such "forgotten and abandoned(by kerbals)" parts.
